project.name: CConvertion
project.description:
Program can be used to convert currencies of the euro to pound sterling quickly and easily, we hope that Wonder User.
"CCONVERTION" is simple and easy to use that contains several fields and a checkbox and also contains an interface to browser website to introduce the user's Exchange Rates are always changing so the user can find the latest updates to the conversion rates, Will show how the program works step by step, as well as pictures showing the program interface.
